deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate 2>&1; timeout 30 python manage.py migrate --database=audit 2>&1 || echo 'Audit migrate timed out'; python manage.py seed 2>&1 || true; echo 'Starting gunicorn on port '$PORT; exec gunicorn konote.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 2 --timeout 120 --log-level info --error-logfile - --access-logfile -
